short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explore a random story from Hacker News with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a "random" link in the header navigation, which takes you to a random post on the HN. Users can choose between Best, Top, "Show HN" and new posts.
